alert.note: Alert for Hubbard (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 6:43PM CST until January 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Patchy light freezing drizzle, changing over to snow later tonight. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Hubbard County. * WHEN...Until noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions may develop through Saturday. The conditions may impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
